name: Green Coffee Company, Inc.
description: Green Coffee Company, Inc. is a leading specialty coffee roaster and distributor, committed to sourcing high-quality, sustainable coffee beans from around the world. Founded in 2010, GCBC has established itself as a notable player in the coffee industry by prioritizing ethical sourcing practices and environmental sustainability. The company partners directly with farmers to ensure fair trade practices and supports organic farming methods, which contribute to the preservation of biodiversity and the health of ecosystems. Green Coffee Company offers a diverse range of products, including single-origin coffees, blends, and flavored coffees, catering to both retail and wholesale customers. The company also emphasizes innovation, with a focus on developing new brewing technologies and sustainable packaging solutions. GCBC's mission is to create exceptional coffee experiences while fostering a positive impact on the communities it serves. With a growing network of cafes and online sales, Green Coffee Company aims to expand its presence in the specialty coffee market, promoting sustainability and quality in every cup.

seo.meta_title: Green Coffee Company, Inc. | Specialty Coffee Roaster
seo.meta_description: Explore Green Coffee Company, Inc., a leader in specialty coffee roasting focused on sustainability and quality. Discover our unique blends and brewing solutions.

faq.question: What types of coffee does Green Coffee Company offer?
faq.answer: Green Coffee Company offers single-origin coffees, blends, and flavored coffees.

faq.question: Where is Green Coffee Company headquartered?
faq.answer: Green Coffee Company is headquartered in Seattle, Washington, USA.

faq.question: When was Green Coffee Company founded?
faq.answer: Green Coffee Company was founded in 2010.
